text: wamin hwla' almtkhlfyn eankum -ayha almwmnwn- fi ghzw (tbwk) akharun mwkhrwn; liaqdi allah fihim ma hu qad. whwla' hum aladhin ndmu ealaa ma felu, whm: murart bin alrbye, wkeb bin malk, whlal bin 'umyat, 'iimaa yueadhibuhum allh, wa'iimaa yaefu eanhum. wallah ealim biman yastahiqu aleuqubat 'aw alefw, hakim fi kl aqwalh wafealh
